timeline.bodyText: How does this behave if you don't supply the HOST_IP env var to the docker command?
timeline.author: RatanRSur

replies.bodyText:
if you don't supply the HOST_IP en var the NatManager will try to retrieve the value of the p2p-host CLI parameter given when besu started. If this parameter is not given it will be the default value of p2p-host as described in the code below.
  private String p2pHost = autoDiscoverDefaultIP().getHostAddress();

To sum up:

HOST_IP env var
p2p-host CLI parameter given when besu started
default value of p2p-host
replies.author: matkt
